name: Flux (Charlie Bennett)
description:
A Co-operative Spaceship Management game revolving around 4-Players and their ability to work together. Xbox USB Controllers are required. When you're stuck in space your friends are all you have left and together you can make it!

Created By:
Adrian Pedrazzoli - Programmer
Alex Scicluna - Programmer
Brayden Buckley - Producer/Designer
Bruno Mitrov - Artist
Charlie Bennett - Designer
Charlie Franzke - Artist
